pre_steps.step: if [ -e /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf ]; then cp -p /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf.bak; else true; fi

if ! grep -q "^lifelog=false" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^lifelog=.*/lifelog=false/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

case.name: test-crash-reporter-daemon
case.description: Verify, crash-reporter-daemon is running and restarted.
case.step: if ! grep -q "^notifications=true" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^notifications=.*/notifications=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if grep -q "^sending=" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^sending=.*/notifications=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if ! grep -q "^automaticsending=false" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^automaticsending=.*/automaticsending=false/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

case.name: test-crash-reporter-ui-notify-dialog
case.description: Verify that crash-reporter-ui is started, when crash occurs.
case.step: if ! grep -q "^notifications=true" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^notifications=.*/notifications=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if grep -q "^sending=" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^sending=.*/notifications=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if ! grep -q "^automaticsending=false" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^automaticsending=.*/automaticsending=false/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

case.name: test-crash-reporter-ui-send-selected-dialog
case.description: Verify that crash-reporter-ui is started, when unsent crash reports are found.
case.step: if ! grep -q "^notifications=true" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^notifications=.*/notifications=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if grep -q "^sending=" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^sending=.*/notifications=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if ! grep -q "^automaticsending=false" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^automaticsending=.*/automaticsending=false/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

xval=0; for i in $(seq 0 30); do su - user -c "dbus-send --session --print-reply --dest=org.freedesktop.DBus / org.freedesktop.DBus.GetConnectionUnixProcessID string:'com.nokia.CrashReporter.DialogServer'"; if [ $xval -eq $? ]; then exit 0; fi; sleep .1; done; exit 1;

case.name: test-crash-reporter-autouploader-new-crash-found
case.description: Verify that crash-reporter-autouploader is started, when crash occurs.
case.step: if ! grep -q "^automaticsending=true" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^automaticsending=.*/automaticsending=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

(/usr/lib/crash-reporter-tests/testdata/crasher&); xval=0; for i in $(seq 0 50); do su - user -c "dbus-send --session --print-reply --dest=org.freedesktop.DBus / org.freedesktop.DBus.GetConnectionUnixProcessID string:'com.nokia.CrashReporter.AutoUploader'"; if [ $xval -eq $? ]; then exit 0; fi; sleep .1; done; exit 1;

case.name: test-crash-reporter-autouploader-bootup
case.description: Verify that crash-reporter-autouploader is started, when unsent crash reports are found during boot-up.
case.step: if ! grep -q "^automaticsending=true" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^automaticsending=.*/automaticsending=true/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

xval=0; for i in $(seq 0 50); do su - user -c "dbus-send --session --print-reply --dest=org.freedesktop.DBus / org.freedesktop.DBus.GetConnectionUnixProcessID string:'com.nokia.CrashReporter.AutoUploader'"; if [ $xval -eq $? ]; then exit 0; fi; sleep .1; done; exit 1;

case.name: test-crash-reporter-sending-disabled
case.description: Verify that neither crash-reporter-ui nor crash-reporter-autouploader is started when sending and automaticsending are disabled.
case.step: if ! grep -q "^notifications=false" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^notifications=.*/notifications=false/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if grep -q "^sending=" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^sending=.*/notifications=false/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

if ! grep -q "^automaticsending=false" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; then sed -ie "s/^automaticsending=.*/automaticsending=false/" /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf && sleep 2; fi

(/usr/lib/crash-reporter-tests/testdata/crasher&); xval=0; for i in $(seq 0 30); do su - user -c "dbus-send --session --print-reply --dest=org.freedesktop.DBus / org.freedesktop.DBus.GetConnectionUnixProcessID string:'com.nokia.CrashReporter.AutoUploader'"; if [ $xval -eq $? ]; then exit 0; fi; sleep .1; done; exit 1;

post_steps.step: if [ -e /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf.bak ]; then mv /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf.bak /home/user/.config/crash-reporter-settings/crash-reporter-privacy.conf; else true; fi
